statements: SELECT * FROM counterparty_credit_risk;
SELECT counterparty_id, credit_rating FROM counterparty_credit_risk;
SELECT credit_rating, exposure_limit FROM counterparty_credit_risk;
SELECT * FROM counterparty_credit_risk WHERE credit_rating = 'AAA';
SELECT * FROM counterparty_credit_risk WHERE exposure_limit > 100000;
SELECT * FROM counterparty_credit_risk ORDER BY counterparty_id DESC;
SELECT counterparty_id, credit_rating FROM counterparty_credit_risk WHERE credit_rating = 'AAA';
SELECT * FROM counterparty_credit_risk ORDER BY exposure_limit ASC;
SELECT counterparty_id, credit_rating, exposure_limit FROM counterparty_credit_risk WHERE counterparty_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT counterparty_id, credit_rating, exposure_limit FROM counterparty_credit_risk WHERE exposure_limit > 1000;
SELECT * FROM counterparty_credit_ratings;
SELECT counterparty_name, credit_rating FROM counterparty_credit_ratings;
SELECT * FROM exposure_limits WHERE exposure_limit > 5000;
SELECT counterparty_name, exposure_limit FROM exposure_limits ORDER BY exposure_limit DESC;
SELECT counterparty_name, credit_rating FROM counterparty_credit_ratings WHERE credit_rating = 'AAA';
SELECT * FROM counterparty_credit_ratings ORDER BY credit_rating DESC, counterparty_name ASC;
SELECT counterparty_name, credit_rating FROM counterparty_credit_ratings WHERE credit_rating = 'AAA';
SELECT counterparty_name, SUM(exposure_limit) AS total_exposure FROM exposure_limits GROUP BY counterparty_name HAVING total_exposure > 100000;
SELECT cc.counterparty_name, el.exposure_limit FROM counterparty_credit_ratings cc JOIN exposure_limits el ON cc.counterparty_name = el.counterparty_name;

SELECT DISTINCT cc.counterparty_name, cc.credit_rating, el.exposure_limit FROM counterparty_credit_ratings cc LEFT JOIN exposure_limits el ON cc.counterparty_name = el.counterparty_name WHERE el.exposure_limit IS NULL OR cc.credit_rating = 'BBB';
SELECT * FROM counterparty_credit_ratings;
SELECT counterparty_id, credit_rating FROM counterparty_credit_ratings ORDER BY credit_rating DESC;
SELECT counterparty_name, country FROM counterparty_details WHERE country='USA';
SELECT counterparty_name, industry FROM counterparty_details WHERE industry='Technology' ORDER BY counterparty_name ASC;
SELECT counterparty_id, exposure_limit FROM exposure_limits WHERE exposure_limit > 100000;
SELECT * FROM counterparty_credit_ratings
SELECT counterparty_id, credit_rating FROM counterparty_credit_ratings ORDER BY credit_rating DESC
SELECT counterparty_id, credit_rating, date_updated FROM counterparty_credit_ratings WHERE credit_rating = 'AAA'
SELECT c.counterparty_name, c.country, e.exposure_limit FROM counterparty_details c JOIN exposure_limits e ON c.counterparty_id = e.counterparty_id

SELECT c.counterparty_id, c.counterparty_name, c.country, e.exposure_limit, e.date_updated FROM counterparty_details c JOIN exposure_limits e ON c.counterparty_id = e.counterparty_id ORDER BY e.exposure_limit DESC
SELECT * FROM CreditRating;
SELECT rating_id, credit_rating FROM CreditRating WHERE valid_to IS NULL;
SELECT counterparty_name, exposure_limit FROM Counterparty JOIN ExposureLimit ON Counterparty.counterparty_id = ExposureLimit.counterparty_id;
SELECT * FROM CreditRating WHERE valid_from > '2023-01-01';
SELECT agency_name FROM ExternalRatingAgency;
SELECT * FROM CreditRating WHERE valid_from > '2022-01-01';
SELECT credit_rating, valid_to FROM CreditRating WHERE credit_rating = 'AAA';
SELECT * FROM ExposureLimit WHERE exposure_limit >= 1000000;
SELECT counterparty_id, valid_from FROM CreditRating ORDER BY valid_from DESC;
SELECT counterparty_id, counterparty_name FROM Counterparty WHERE counterparty_name LIKE '%Bank%';
SELECT * FROM credit_ratings ORDER BY rating_date DESC;
SELECT counterparty_name, credit_rating FROM credit_ratings WHERE credit_rating = 'AAA';
SELECT counterparty_name, limit_amount FROM exposure_limits WHERE limit_type = 'credit';
SELECT counterparty_name, address, contact_number FROM counterparty_details;
SELECT counterparty_name, exposure_amount, exposure_date FROM risk_exposures WHERE exposure_amount > 1000 ORDER BY exposure_amount DESC;
SELECT counterparty_name, credit_rating, rating_date FROM credit_ratings WHERE credit_rating = 'AAA' ORDER BY rating_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM exposure_limits WHERE limit_amount > 100000 ORDER BY limit_amount ASC;
SELECT counterparty_name, address, contact_number FROM counterparty_details WHERE id = 3;
SELECT counterparty_name, exposure_amount, exposure_date FROM risk_exposures WHERE exposure_amount > 50000 ORDER BY exposure_amount DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT counterparty_name, credit_score, score_date FROM credit_score_history WHERE credit_score < 700 ORDER BY score_date ASC LIMIT 10;
